blueskynet: Analyze and Visualize Networks on Bluesky Social

Source: R/blueskynet-package.R
blueskynet-package.Rd

Provides comprehensive tools for collecting, analyzing, and visualizing social networks from Bluesky Social https://bsky.app. Enables users to authenticate with the Bluesky API, collect follower networks, perform community detection, calculate network metrics, and create interactive 3D visualizations. Includes functions for network expansion algorithms, text analysis of user profiles, and follow/unfollow management. Designed for social network researchers, data scientists, and anyone interested in understanding social structures on Bluesky Social.
